properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 c1 v3 c1 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a vision filled my eyes
One like a Son of Man
Coming with the clouds of heav'n
He approached an awesome throne

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He was given sovereign pow'r
Glory and authority
Ev'ry nation, tribe and tongue
Worshipped him on bended knee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
On the throne forever
See the Lamb who once was slain
Wounds of sacrificial love
Forever shall remain

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And He shall reign forever
His throne and crown
Shall ever endure
And He shall reign forever
And we shall reign with Him
